title: High Real Interest Rate
description: In 2023, Madagascar recorded a real interest rate of 41.30%, one of the highest globally, indicating potential challenges in accessing affordable credit.

title: Elevated Risk Premium on Lending
description: The risk premium on lending in Madagascar was 43.86% in 2023, suggesting significant financial risks and high borrowing costs.

title: Low Utility Services Efficiency
description: In 2024, Madagascar's B-READY score for utility services was 35.04, highlighting inefficiencies in service provision.

title: Significant Value Loss from Electrical Outages
description: In 2022, firms in Madagascar lost 24% of sales due to electrical outages, indicating severe infrastructure challenges.

title: Short Compulsory Education Duration
description: Madagascar mandates only 5 years of compulsory education as of 2023, which is among the shortest globally.

title: Low Female Persistence to Grade 5
description: In 2018, only 33.26% of female students in Madagascar persisted to grade 5, reflecting educational retention challenges.

title: High Repetition Rates in Primary Education
description: In 2018, 26.07% of students in Madagascar repeated a grade in primary education, indicating potential issues in educational quality.

title: Low Percentage of Trained Male Teachers
description: In 2019, only 11.16% of male primary teachers in Madagascar were trained, suggesting a need for improved teacher training programs.

title: Minimal Government Expenditure on Tertiary Education
description: In 2016, government expenditure per student in tertiary education was just 0.038% of GDP per capita, one of the lowest globally.

title: Limited Access to Basic Sanitation in Urban Areas
description: As of 2022, only 21.64% of Madagascar's urban population had access to basic sanitation services, highlighting public health challenges.

title: High Female Labor Force Participation
description: In 2024, 82.56% of females aged 15+ participated in the labor force, showcasing a strong female workforce presence.
